Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    true,
    IsBlank(BoysProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && BoysSize.Selected.Result && BoysColour.Selected.Colour && BoysBrand.Selected.Brands && Value(BoysPriceMin.Text) && Value(BoysPriceMax.Text)),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        Gender = "Boys"
    ),
    !IsBlank(BoysProductType.SearchText) && IsBlank(BoysSize.Selected.Result && BoysColour.Selected.Colour && Value(BoysPriceMin.Text) && Value(BoysPriceMax.Text) && BoysBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = BoysProductType.Selected.'Product Type'
    ),
    !IsBlank(BoysProductType.SearchText && BoysSize.Selected.Result) && IsBlank(BoysColour.Selected.Colour && Value(BoysPriceMin.Text) && Value(BoysPriceMax.Text) && BoysBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = BoysProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = BoysProductType.Selected.Size
    ),
    !IsBlank(BoysProductType.SearchText && BoysSize.Selected.Result && BoysColour.Selected.Colour) && IsBlank(Value(BoysPriceMin.Text) && Value(BoysPriceMax.Text) && BoysBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = BoysProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = BoysProductType.Selected.Size && Colour = BoysColour.Selected.Colour
    ),
    !IsBlank(BoysProductType.SearchText && BoysSize.Selected.Result && BoysColour.Selected.Colour && Value(BoysPriceMin.Text)) && IsBlank(Value(BoysPriceMax.Text) && BoysBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = BoysProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = BoysProductType.Selected.Size && Colour = BoysColour.Selected.Colour && Price >= Value(BoysPriceMin.Text)
    ),
    !IsBlank(BoysProductType.SearchText && BoysSize.Selected.Result && BoysColour.Selected.Colour && Value(BoysPriceMin.Text) && Value(BoysPriceMax.Text)) && IsBlank(BoysBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = BoysProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = BoysProductType.Selected.Size && Colour = BoysColour.Selected.Colour && Price >= Value(BoysPriceMin.Text) && Price <= Value(BoysPriceMax.Text)
    ),
    !IsBlank(BoysProductType.SearchText && BoysSize.Selected.Result && BoysColour.Selected.Colour && Value(BoysPriceMin.Text) && Value(BoysPriceMax.Text) && BoysBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = BoysProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = BoysProductType.Selected.Size && Colour = BoysColour.Selected.Colour && Price >= Value(BoysPriceMin.Text) && Price <= Value(BoysPriceMax.Text) && Brands = BoysBrand.Selected.Brands
    )
)

"SELECT * FROM OurProducts" & " WHERE " & "Product Type = [" & Text(BoysProductType.Selected.'Product Type') & "], " & "Size = [" & Text(BoysSize.Selected.Result) & "], " & "Colour = [" & Text(BoysColour.Selected.Colour) & "], " & "Price = [>" & Text(BoysPriceMin) & "] " & "[<" & Text(BoysPriceMax) & "], " & "Brand = [" & Text(BoysBrand.Selected.Brands) & "]"
